html: Just got home from a very wonderful evening. @TheEqualizer was amazing. Even tho my part was cut out lol. I really enjoyed the movie. Denzel you the truth. And tell Jake king Kong ain't got shit on me.

text:
Last week, 14-year NBA veteran @DwightHoward was honored by the @PointsofLight organization for his outstanding leadership and valuable mentorship in the community!
